<Olga Kosakiewicz
1:
--------------------
Text: Olga Kosakiewicz:  She and her sister, Wanda, were fused together to make one central character in de Beauvoir's first novel "L'Invitée" ("She Came to Stay", 1943), which was dedicated to Olga (where her name appears as Kosakievicz in the Norton translation).
Triplets:<Olga Kosakiewicz
